headline: PPL to Pay Quarterly Stock Dividend Jan 2, 2026
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) declared a quarterly common stock dividend on Friday, Nov. 21, 2025, of $0.2725 per share, payable Jan. 2, 2026 to shareowners of record as of Dec.10, 2025.

raw.headline: PPL to Pay Quarterly Stock Dividend Jan 2, 2026

headline: What Catalysts Are Shaping the Evolving Story for PPL Investors?
summary: PPL stock has recently seen analysts adjust their price target, reflecting evolving views on sector dynamics and company performance. Updates include a modest increase in the discount rate and a slight reduction in projected revenue growth. This is counterbalanced by persistent optimism toward long-term catalysts such as data center expansion and nuclear energy. Stay tuned to discover how these shifting factors shape the ongoing narrative and to learn how to keep informed about future...
